channel.title: CVE Feed for nextendweb -- Smart Slider 3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nextendweb -- Smart Slider 3

item.title: CVE-2024-3027|2024-04-13T01:57:49.676Z -- nextendweb -- smart%20slider%203
item.description: The Smart Slider 3 plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the upload function in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.1.22. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to upload files, including SVG files, which can be used to conduct stored cross-site scripting attacks.
